title: Bug 40406Clicking in tree does not bring window to the front.
OB: Bug 40406Clicking in tree does not bring window to the front.
SR: 1) Start eclipse and make the Navigator visisble.2) Bring some other application window in front of the Eclipse workbench (keeping the Navigatorvisible).3) Click on an item in the Navigator4) Notice that Eclipse is not brought to the front.
